useCases.name: Query data and read dashboards
useCases.description: Azure Managed Grafana MCP enables AI agents to access Grafana data, including querying data sources and reading dashboards. For example, say a user wants to understand the average monthly revenue. They can ask the question of their Grafana instance, and the MCP server will translate the question into the appropriate query and return the response.

grafanaServiceAccount.description: Authenticate with Azure Managed Grafana using a Service Account access token.

grafanaOauth.description: Authenticate with Azure Managed Grafana using OAuth2 authorization code flow with PKCE support.
